review_title: Off to dreamland on a cloud
review_text: The ingredients used in Power to sleep are not only high quality (seen by how quickly they work) but are easy to swallow because of the small sized gel caps. The gel caps have increased my sleep length from 2 hours to 6-8 hours consisted, benefitting my energy and well being during the day.

The 2 mg dosage works well for me for a gentle sleep-inducing effect. Yes, these pills are more expensive than others, but I like products from this brand and the price on IHerb is lower than in drugstores . Discounts on this brand are rare.

review_title: Never need to worry about sleep again!
review_text: This works really well for me in falling asleep, I try not to use it every night because I don't want to be dependent on it, but especially for weekends where I'm up partying the night before and throwing off my schedule, I take this so I can ensure I fall asleep well rested for Monday morning. A single pill works enough for me. I also get overly excited sometimes at night, and this definitely helps a lot with my insomnia and putting me to sleep. I like the ingredients a lot, they seem to be well researched and plant based. I think the combination of herbs such as ashwagandha and GABA not only helps with sleep but also stress and they are of good quality. The pills are a little large in a gel capsule type, so some people might not like the size, but I have no problem with swallowing pills. They don't have much of a taste. My only issue is I would prefer a version without melatonin, for the reason that I don't want to be dependent on it too. But the quantity isn't exceptionally high. I think for the number of pills it is pretty worth it, will definitely buy again.

review_title: I Could Not Believe How Great This Sleep Aid Worked!
review_text: I have been on one of the strongest prescription there is for years, about 5 years to be exact.  I wanted to get off of it so my doctor told me about a client she has who had terrible insomnia and tried "Power to Sleep".  She told the doctor that it worked like no other sleeping medication she has tried.  She had a full night sleep (an 8 hour full sleep) woke up feeling energized.  So I went home and purchased them online.  I took them the day they came in and that woman was right, I slept like a baby!  I have to take 2 of them because of my current prescription strength and now I'm a week of weaning off of my prescription sleep med and only take the supplement.  I've been taking them for at least a month now and no side effects.  I would tell anyone who has trouble sleeping to try taking at first 1 pill.  If that doesn't work, try 2.  They WILL work.  It's weird how great they work.  I do not ever rate or write about products but I had to take some time and tell everyone about this.  BUY IT!
